revised_title: On the Persistence of Palaeozoic Coral Types and the Affinities of Guynia annulata
tldr: This article discusses the persistence of Palaeozoic coral types and the unique structures and affinities of the species Guynia annulata. The author examines the connections between coral-faunas in Australia, Europe, and the Atlantic Ocean, and explores the evolution of coral species with different septal arrangements.
